fallback: AR is unavailable. Using 2D map mode.
heading: Heading
permissionsWarning: Camera and sensors require HTTPS and user permission.
httpsWarning: This app must run over HTTPS for AR sensors to work.
accuracyDisclaimer: Overlays depend on consumer GPS and may deviate up to 10 meters.
permissionDenied: Camera or location permission denied. Falling back to 2D map mode.
arIntro: When AR is enabled, your camera feed appears here with GPS overlays.
